==Dutch==

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|dum|nl}} {{term|een|lang=dum}}, from {{etyl|odt|nl}} {{term|en|ēn|lang=odt}}, {{term|ein|lang=odt}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|nl}} {{recons|ainaz|lang=gem-pro}}, from {{etyl|ine-pro|nl}} {{recons|óynos|lang=ine-pro}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/ən/|lang=nl}}
* {{audio|Nl-Netherlands een.ogg|Audio|lang=nl}}
* {{audio|Nl-Belgium een.ogg|Audio (Belgium)|lang=nl}}

===Numeral===
{{cardinalbox|nl|0|1|2|nul|twee|ord=eerst}}
{{head|nl|numeral}}
